author: dain
msg: Changed transaction context commit to return a boolean indicating if the transation actually committed.
UserTransaction uses the boolean flag to determine if the tx rolledback and if so, throws a RolledbackException

msg: apreq_parse_cookie_header() failed to parse RFC Cookie headers which
contained no space chars after the '$Version=1' preamble.
